name: adhesively
content:

in a way that involves something sticking to a surface: The two components are adhesively bonded at their edges. A thick glutinous substance had congealed adhesively around the neck of the jar.
More examplesFewer examplesThe printed circuit board is adhesively affixed to the base of the housing.An adhesively bonded joint is typically more efficient than a mechanically fastened joint because fasteners introduce point loads and the joint must be designed to withstand those peak stresses.They are measuring the distance travelled by adhesively dispersed seeds and those dispersed by the wind.
